EmailTemplate.description: EPH-6329 BOB MGMT - Submit / Approve / Activate BOB
EmailTemplate.name: BoB Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your submitted Managed Seller Group has been confirmed and activated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!BOB__c.OwnerFullName}
{!GCX_LEAD} has confirmed your new Managed Seller Group {!BOB__c.Name} and will shortly be loaded to the DW table. To view your confirmed Managed Seller Group please click here Link to the Managed Seller Group
In the csv attachment you can find the list of all New-In and Removed Sellers - so that GCX operations can adjust the following for affected sellers in Unify/AD:
- P1 MAC Note - SS Flag 4 - Seller Ribbon in Unify - Issue Whitelisitng - Please also see additional comments if additional flagging is required e.g. setting lisiting limits or any specific flags
Thank you,
HIVE
